key_risks: Supply chain vulnerabilities due to reliance on raw materials like steel and zinc
Economic sensitivity tied to cyclical industries such as construction and energy
Environmental compliance risks from stringent regulations
Integration risks from recent acquisitions like Precoat Metals
Historical regulatory violations including hazardous waste and workplace safety issues
controversies: Regulatory violations with fines exceeding $175,000 since 2000
Labor relations issues, including a $40,000 settlement in 2009
environmental_issues: Metal coating processes subject to stringent environmental regulations
Historical environmental violations raising concerns about operational oversight
social_issues: Past labor violations and workforce management risks
Potential reputational risks from historical controversies
governance_issues: Ongoing challenges in regulatory and operational compliance

sources.title: AZZ, Inc. (AZZ) Summary | Company valuation, comparison, AI analysis ...
sources.snippet: AZZ, Inc. engages in the provision of hot-dip galvanizing and coil coating solutions. It operates through the following segments: AZZ Metal Coatings, AZZ Precoat Metals, and AZZ Infrastructure Solutions. The AZZ Metal Coatings segment provides metal finishing solutions for corrosion protection including hot-dip galvanizing, spin galvanizing, powder coating, anodizing, and plating.
